dashboard.title: RBAC Role Management - Production Monitoring
dashboard.description: Comprehensive monitoring for RBAC role management system

targets.query: SELECT status, COUNT(*) FROM rbac_role_pending_changes WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' GROUP BY status

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('hour', created_at) as time, PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(epoch FROM (updated_at - created_at))/60) as p50, PERCENTILE_CONT(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(epoch FROM (updated_at - created_at))/60) as p95 FROM rbac_role_pending_changes WHERE status IN ('approved', 'rejected') AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT CASE WHEN r.level >= 60 THEN 'Executive+' WHEN r.level >= 40 THEN 'Manager' WHEN r.level >= 30 THEN 'Operations' ELSE 'Ground' END as level_group, COUNT(*) FROM rbac_role_pending_changes pc JOIN rbac_roles r ON pc.role_id = r.id WHERE pc.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' GROUP BY level_group
SELECT denial_reason, COUNT(*) FROM security_audit_log WHERE event_type = 'ACCESS_DENIED' AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' GROUP BY denial_reason

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('minute', timestamp) as time, PERCENTILE_CONT(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY response_time_ms) as p95_response_time FROM api_metrics WHERE endpoint LIKE '/api/rbac/roles%' AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT r.name, pc.status, pc.created_at, pc.updated_at, pc.proposed_by, pc.approver_id FROM rbac_role_pending_changes pc JOIN rbac_roles r ON pc.role_id = r.id WHERE r.name IN ('ground_ops', 'support', 'executive', 'iam_admin') AND pc.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' ORDER BY pc.created_at DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', changed_at) as time, COUNT(*) as version_count FROM rbac_role_versions WHERE changed_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT AVG(response_time_ms) as avg_export_time, MAX(response_time_ms) as max_export_time FROM api_metrics WHERE endpoint = '/api/rbac/roles' AND query_params LIKE '%format=%' AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
